law.catch_line: Waiver or renunciation of claim or right after default.
law.text: Any claim or right arising out of an alleged default or breach of warranty may be discharged in whole or in part without consideration by a written waiver or renunciation signed and delivered by the aggrieved party.
law.history: Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 363, sec. 7, effective January 1, 1991.
